It's ok. U will will heal.

Why need to let go these feelings?

Sometimes it's ok to let go of feeling. Because it will hurt you more if u dnt let it go

"May the petals teach me the art of letting go - Xan Oku"

Accept your emotions

Don't stop yourself from having a good cry if you feel one coming on. Accept the feelings you have, rather than think you "should" feel a different way.

Talk about it when you can

Some people want to tell the story of their loss or talk about their feelings. But sometimes people don't feel like talking. That's OK, too. No one should feel pressured to talk.

Get the support you need

It takes time to adjust after a loved one dies. And it helps to have plenty of support. You can get support from family, friends, or adult mentors in your life.
